# Family Tree App Implementation Plan

## Notes
- User wants an app with splash screen, login, registration (name, email, phone), password, OTP, success, and home screen flows.
- UI implementation for splash, login, registration, and OTP flows is in progress.
- Home screen should have Instagram-like UI showing posts and stories from family group.
- After login/register, users can join an existing family (with invite code) or create a new family (with unique invite code per user).
- Invite codes must be unique and not reused for any user.
- Screenshots provided as reference for UI/UX.
- Use MVVM + BLoC architecture for state management and code organization.
- Folder structure should separate core, data, domain, and presentation layers as described.

## Task List
- [x] Implement splash screen
- [x] Implement login screen
- [x] Implement registration screen (name, email, phone)
- [ ] Implement password creation screen
- [x] Implement OTP send/verify flow
- [ ] Implement successful registration screen
- [ ] Implement home screen (Instagram-like UI for posts/stories)
- [ ] Implement join family screen (with invite code)
- [ ] Implement create family screen (generate unique code per user)
- [ ] Ensure invite codes are unique for each user
- [ ] Set up folder structure for MVVM + BLoC
- [ ] Implement navigation between all screens
- [ ] Integrate Firebase/Auth backend for OTP, login, and registration

## Current Goal
Implement password creation screen and navigation
